hero.headline: From Lead to Booked Call in Under 60 Seconds
hero.subheadline: Dobify is an AI agency delivering AI automations that capture, qualify, and contact your leads instantly—while your competitors are still checking email.

features.title: The tools you need to scale
features.subtitle: Six tools built into one platform.

leadGen.title: Lead Generation
leadGen.subtitle: Paid Ads
leadGen.description: Targeted ad campaigns on Meta, Google & TikTok that bring qualified prospects to your pipeline.

aiCaller.title: AI Caller
aiCaller.subtitle: Speed to Lead
aiCaller.description: Our AI voice agent contacts every new lead within seconds. It qualifies them, books meetings, and handles follow-ups 24/7.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.subtitle: Automated Dashboards
dataAnalysis.description: Live Excel & BI dashboards that show exactly what's happening. No manual reports, no guessing.

crm.title: CRM
crm.subtitle: Client Database
crm.description: Manage the client journey in one place. Track exactly where deals are, from first touch to closed won.

notificationBot.title: Real-Time Notification Bot
notificationBot.subtitle: Instant Alerts
notificationBot.description: Get Slack, WhatsApp, and email alerts the second a lead converts or a deal closes.

smsCampaigns.title: SMS & Email Campaigns
smsCampaigns.subtitle: Automated Outreach
smsCampaigns.description: Automated SMS and email sequences to follow up with leads and recover abandoned prospects.

step1.title: Capture
step1.description: We run ad campaigns that bring high-intent leads into your pipeline.

step2.title: Qualify
step2.description: Our AI asks the right questions and scores each lead, filtering out the noise.

step3.title: Book
step3.description: Qualified leads get a call in seconds. Meetings go straight to your calendar.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.subtitle: Custom setups built for how you actually work.

aiAutomation.title: AI Automation
aiAutomation.description: We build custom AI agents for repetitive work, so your team doesn't have to do it. Think customer support and data entry.

appDevelopment.title: App Development
appDevelopment.description: We design and build native mobile apps using modern frameworks.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: We design and build fast, responsive websites.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: We set up data architecture and analytics pipelines so your team can actually understand their numbers.

testimonials.title: Trusted by teams that care about growth
testimonials.subtitle: See what our clients have to say.

reviews.name: Sarah Mitchell
reviews.text: Dobify completely transformed our sales pipeline. We went from missing 40% of leads to booking calls within seconds. Revenue is up 280% in 6 months.

reviews.name: James Kowalski
reviews.text: The AI caller is a game-changer. It handles the first touch so my team can focus on closing. We've tripled our conversion rate.

reviews.name: Anna Bergström
reviews.text: The automated dashboards alone saved us 20 hours a week. Now add the AI caller and CRM integration—it's like having 5 extra employees.

cta.title: Ready to move faster?
cta.subtitle: Get a free audit of your lead flow and see where you're losing deals.

footer.description: Dobify — an AI agency specializing in AI automations for marketing. We help businesses capture, qualify, and convert leads faster than ever.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At DOBIFY SPÓŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website and services.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a form, request an audit, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and company name. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and usage of our website using cookies and similar technologies.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, process requests, and send you marketing communications (which you can opt out of at any time).

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party service providers who help us operate our business (e.g., hosting, analytics, email delivery), subject to confidentiality obligations.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location (including under GDPR), you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at our registered address above.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.intro: Welcome to Dobify. These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website and services provided by DOBIFY SPÓŁKA Z OGRANICZONĄ ODPOWIEDZIALNOŚCIĄ.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

use.title: 2. Use of Services
use.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You must not use our website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality on this website are owned by Dobify and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Dobify shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues.

changes.title: 5. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of significant changes by posting the new Terms on this site.

law.title: 6. Governing Law
law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
